nodes.text: Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire Micro Machines

The Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire Micro Machines toy line was manufactured by Galoob in 1996 as part of the Shadows of the Empire multimedia project. The line comprised five waves of Micro Machines toys inspired by the Shadows of the Empire story. The first three sets of the series included a Shadows of the Empire minicomic as a bonus.
